name: absorb
effect: Absorb deals damage and the user will recover 50% of the HP drained.

name: acid
effect: Acid has a 33.2% chance to lower opponent's Defense by 1 stage

name: acid armor
effect: Acid Armor raises the user's Defense by 2 stages

name: agility
effect: Agility raises the user's Speed by 2 stages

name: amnesia
effect: Amnesia raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.

name: aurora beam
effect: Aurora Beam deals damage and has a 10% chance of lowering the opponent's Attack by 1 stage.

name: barrage
effect: Barrage hits 2-5 times per turn used. 2 hits prob. 3/8, power 30; 3 hits prob. 3/8, power 45; 4 hits prob. 1/8, power 60; 5 hits prob. 1/8, power 75;

name: barrier
effect: Barrier raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

name: bide
effect: The user of Bide delays its move to store energy, then strikes back with damage equal to twice its missing HP.

name: bind
effect: Bind inflicts damage on the first turn then traps the opponent, causing them to lose 1/8 of their maximum HP after each turn, for 4-5 turns.

name: bite
effect: Bite deals damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: blizzard
effect: Blizzard deals damage and has a 10% chance of freezing the target.

name: body slam
effect: Body Slam deals damage and has a 30% chance of paralyzing the target. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: bone club
effect: Bone Club deals damage and has a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: bonemerang
effect: Bonemerang deals damage and will strike twice (with 50 base power each time). Each strike of Bonemerang is treated like a separate attack.

name: bubble
effect: Bubble deals damage and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Speed by 1 stage.

name: bubble beam
effect: Bubble Beam deals damage and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Speed by 1 stage.

name: clamp
effect: Clamp inflicts regular damage for 2-5 turns. While in effect, the target is unable to attack.

name: comet punch
effect: Comet Punch hits 2-5 times per turn used. 2 hits prob. 3/8 power 36; 3 hits prob 3/8 power 36; 4 hits prob. 1/8 power 72; 5 hits prob. 1/8 power 90.

name: confuse ray
effect: Confuse Ray causes the target to become confused. Confused Monster have a 50% chance of hurting themselves each turn, for 1-4 attacking turns. The damage received is as if the Monster attacks itself with a typeless 40 base power Physical attack.

name: confusion
effect: Confusion deals damage and has a 10% chance of confusing the target.

name: constrict
effect: Constrict deals damage and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Speed by 1 stage.

name: conversion
effect: Conversion changes the user's type to the oponnent monster's type

name: counter
effect: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

name: crabhammer
effect: Increases critical hit ratio (+1 = 12,5% instead of 6,25, +2 = 50%, +3+ = 100%).

name: defense curl
effect: Defense Curl raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

name: dig
effect: Digs underground on first turn and attacks on second.

name: disable
effect: Disable causes the previous move the target used to be disabled for 1-8 turns, which prevents the move's use.

name: double kick
effect: Double Kick deals damage and will strike twice (with 30 base power each time).

name: double slap
effect: Double Slap hits 2-5 times per turn used. 3 hits prob. 3/8 power 30, 3 hits prob. 3/8 power 45, 4 hits prob.1/8 power 60; 5 hits prob. 1/8 power 75;

name: double team
effect: Double Team raises the user's Evasiveness by 1 stage, thus making the user more difficult to hit.

name: double-edge
effect: Double-Edge deals damage, but the user receives 33,33% of the damage it inflicted in recoil. In other words, if the attack does 90 HP damage to the opponent, the user will lose 30 HP.

name: dragon rage
effect: Dragon Rage always deals 40 HP damage to the target, regardless of typing.

name: dream eater
effect: Dream Eater deals damage only on sleeping foes and the user will recover 50% of the HP drained.

name: ember
effect: Ember deals damage and has a 10% chance of burning the target.

name: explosion
effect: Explosion deals high damage, but causes the user to faint.

name: fire blast
effect: Fire Blast deals damage and has a 10% chance of burning the target.

name: fire punch
effect: Fire Punch deals damage and has a 10% chance of burning the target.

name: fire spin
effect: Fire Spin inflicts damage on the first turn then traps the opponent, causing them to lose 12,5% of their maximum HP after each turn, for 4-5 turns.

name: fissure
effect: If it hits, Fissure is guaranteed to make the opponent faint. But does not affect oponent with a higher Speed than the user.

name: flamethrower
effect: Flamethrower deals damage and has a 10% chance of burning the target.

name: flash
effect: Flash lowers the opponent's Accuracy by 1 stage.

name: fly
effect: The user of Fly will (fly up high) on the first turn. On the second turn, Fly deals damage.

name: focus energy
effect: Increases critical hit ratio (+1 = 12,5% instead of 6,25, +2 = 50%, +3+ = 100%).

name: fury attack
effect: Fury Attack hits 2-5 times per turn used. 2 Hits Prob. 3/8 power 30; 3 hits prob. 3/8 power 45; 4 hits prob. 1/8 power 60; 5 hits prob. 1/8, power 75;

name: fury swipes
effect: Fury Swipes hits 2-5 times per turn used. 2 Hits Prob. 3/8 power 36; 3 hits prob. 3/8 power 54; 4 hits prob. 1/8 power 72; 5 hits prob. 1/8, power 90;

name: glare
effect: Glare paralyzes oponnent. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: growl
effect: Growl lowers the oponnent's Attack by 1 stage.

name: growth
effect: Growth raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage each.

name: guillotine
effect: If it hits, Guillotine is guaranteed to make the opponent faint. But does not affect oponent with a higher Speed than the user.

name: harden
effect: Harden raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

name: haze
effect: Resets all stat changes.

name: headbutt
effect: Headbutt deals damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not moved yet).

name: high jump kick
effect: High Jump Kick deals damage, however, if it misses the user loses 33,33% of its maximum HP, due to crash reason.

name: horn drill
effect: If it hits, Horn Drill is guaranteed to make the opponent faint. But does not affect oponent with a higher Speed than the user.

name: hyper beam
effect: Hyper Beam deals damage, but the user must recharge on the next turn (skipping one round). So if user used Hyper Beam in round 1, then user skipps round 2 and in round 3 he is able to do next move.

name: hyper fang
effect: Hyper Fang deals damage and has a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: hypnosis
effect: Hypnosis puts the target to sleep, if it hits. Sleeping monster cannot move. Sleep lasts for 1-3 turns.

name: ice beam
effect: Ice Beam deals damage and has a 10% chance of freezing the target.

name: ice punch
effect: Ice Punch deals damage and has a 10% chance of freezing the target.

name: jump kick
effect: Jump Kick deals damage, however, if it misses the user losing 33,33% of its maximum HP, due to crash reason.

name: kinesis
effect: Kinesis lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

name: leech life
effect: Leech Life deals damage and the user will recover 50% of the HP drained.

name: leech seed
effect: Leech Seed deals 6,25% of the target's HP and adds to user HP.

name: leer
effect: Leer lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

name: lick
effect: Lick deals damage and has a 30% chance of paralyzing the target. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: light screen
effect: Light Screen reduces damage from Special Attacks by 50%, for 5 turns.

name: lovely kiss
effect: Lovely Kiss puts the target to sleep. Sleeping monster cannot move. Sleep lasts for 1-3 turns.

name: low kick
effect: Low Kick has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: meditate
effect: Meditate raises the user's Attack by one stage.

name: mega drain
effect: Mega Drain deals damage and the user will recover 50% of the HP drained.

name: metronome
effect: Metronome uses a random move chosen from nearly all existing moves, even if the user cannot normally learn it.

name: mimic
effect: Mimic copies the last move used by the target.

name: minimize
effect: Minimize raises the user's Evasion by 2 stages

name: mirror move
effect: User performs the opponent's last move.

name: mist
effect: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time. Lasts 1-3 rounds.

name: night shade
effect: The damage of Night Shade is equal to the user's level. So at level 100 the monster will inflict 100 HP damage.

name: petal dance
effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused. Confused Monster have a 50% chance of hurting themselves each turn, for 1-4 attacking turns. The damage received is as if the Monster attacks itself with a typeless 40 base power Physical attack.

name: pin missile
changes: Pin Missile hits 2-5 times per turn used. 2 hits prob 3/8 power 50, 3 hits prob. 3/8 power 75; 4 hits prob 1/8 power 100; 5 hits prob. 1/8 power 125;

name: poison gas
effect: Poison Gas causes the target to become poisoned. Poisoned monster lose 12,5% of their maximum HP each turn.

name: poison powder
effect: Poison Powder causes the target to become poisoned. Poisoned monster lose 12,5% of their maximum HP each turn.

name: poison sting
effect: Poison Sting deals damage and has a 30% chance of poisoning the target.

name: psybeam
effect: Psybeam deals damage and has a 10% chance of confusing the target.

name: psychic
effect: Psychic deals damage and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense by one stage.

name: psywave
effect: Psywave inflicts a random amount of HP damage, varying between 50% and 150% of the user's level. In other words, at level 100 the damage will be 50-150 HP.

name: quick attack
effect: Quick Attack deals damage and has a priority of +1.

name: rage
effect: Rage always deals 20 HP damage to the target, regardless of typing.

name: razor leaf
effect: Increases critical hit ratio (+1 = 12,5% instead of 6,25, +2 = 50%, +3+ = 100%).

name: razor wind
effect: The user of Razor Wind will (whip up a whirlwind) on the first turn. On the second turn, Razor Wind deals damage

name: recover
effect: Recover restores up to 50% of the user's maximum HP.

name: reflect
effect: Reflect reduces damage from Physical attacks by 50%, for 5 turns.

name: rest
effect: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

name: roar
effect: Roar causes the target to change the monster. If it is last monster, it's faint.

name: rock slide
effect: Rock Slide deals damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: rolling kick
effect: Rolling Kick deals damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: sand attack
effect: Sand Attack lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

name: screech
effect: Screech lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

name: seismic toss
effect: The damage of Seismic Toss is equal to the user's level. So at level 100 the monster will inflict 100 HP damage.

name: self-destruct
effect: Self-Destruct deals high damage, but causes the user to faint.

name: sharpen
effect: Sharpen raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

name: sing
effect: Sing puts the target to sleep, if it hits. Sleeping monster cannot move. Sleep lasts for 1-3 turns.

name: skull bash
effect: The user of Skull Bash will (tuck in its head) on the first turn and raise its Defense by 1 stage. On the second turn, Skull Bash deals damage.

name: sky attack
effect: The user of Sky Attack will become (cloaked in a harsh light) to all attacks on the first turn. On the second turn, Sky Attack deals damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: slash
effect: Increases critical hit ratio (+1 = 12,5% instead of 6,25, +2 = 50%, +3+ = 100%).

name: sleep powder
effect: Sleep Powder puts the target to sleep, if it hits. Sleeping Pok√©mon cannot move (with some exceptions such as Snore). Sleep lasts for 1-3 turns.

effect: Sludge deals damage and has a 30% chance of poisoning the target.

name: smog
effect: Smog deals damage and has a 40% chance of poisoning the target.

effect: Smokescreen lowers the target's Accuracy by 1 stage.

name: soft-boiled
effect: Soft-Boiled recovers up to 50% of the user's maximum HP.

name: solar beam
effect: The user of Solar Beam will (absorb light) on the first turn. On the second turn, Solar Beam deals damage.

name: sonic boom
effect: Sonic Boom always deals 20 HP damage to the target, regardless of typing.

name: spike cannon
changes: Spike Cannon hits 2-5 times per turn used. 2 hits prob 3/8, power 40; 3 hits prob. 3/8 power 60; 4 hits prob. 1/8 power 80; 5 hits prob. 1/8 power 100.

name: spore
effect: Spore puts the target to sleep. Sleeping monster cannot move. Sleep lasts for 1-3 turns.

name: stomp
effect: Stomp deals damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: string shot
effect: String Shot lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

name: struggle
effect: User lose 25% of max HP.

name: stun spore
effect: Stun Spore paralyzes the target, if it hits. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: submission
effect: Submission deals damage, but the user receives 0,25% of the damage it inflicts in recoil. In other words, if the attack does 100 HP damage to the opponent, the user will lose 25 HP.

name: substitute
effect: Uses 25% of HP to creates a decoy that takes hits from 1-3 turns.

name: super fang
effect: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

name: supersonic
effect: Supersonic causes the target to become confused. Confused Monster have a 50% chance of hurting themselves each turn, for 1-4 attacking turns. The damage received is as if the Monster attacks itself with a typeless 40 base power Physical attack.

name: swift
effect: Swift always deals 60 HP damage to the target, regardless of typing.

name: swords dance
effect: Swords Dance raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

name: tail whip
effect: Tail Whip lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

name: take down
effect: Take Down deals damage, but the user receives 0,25% of the damage it inflicted in recoil. In other words, if the attack does 100 HP damage to the opponent, the user will lose 25 HP.

name: thrash
effect: The user of Thrash attacks for 2-3 turns and then becomes confused. Confused Monster have a 50% chance of hurting themselves each turn, for 1-4 attacking turns. The damage received is as if the Monster attacks itself with a typeless 40 base power Physical attack.

name: thunder
effect: Thunder deals damage and has a 30% chance of paralyzing the target. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

effect: Thunder Punch deals damage and has a 10% chance of paralyzing the target. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

effect: Thunder Shock deals damage and has a 10% chance of paralyzing the target. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: thunder wave
effect: Thunder Wave paralyzes the opponent. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: thunderbolt
effect: Thunderbolt deals damage and has a 10% chance of paralyzing the target. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: toxic
effect: Toxic causes the target to be (badly poisoned). Monster that are badly poisoned will lose an increasing amount of HP at the end of each turn. The affected monster will lose 6,25% of its maximum HP at the end of the first turn, which then increases by 6,25% each turn. In other words, they lose 6,25%, 12,5%, 25%, 50%, 100%.

name: transform
effect: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

name: twineedle
effect: Tri Attack deals damage and has a 20% chance of paralyzing. Paralyzed monster have a 25% chance of not being able to attack, and their Speed is decreased by 75%.

name: waterfall
effect: Waterfall deals damage and has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved).

name: whirlwind
effect: Whirlwind forces the oponnent to switch to another monster. If it is last monster, it's faint.

name: withdraw
effect: Withdraw raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

name: wrap
effect: Wrap damage on the first turn then traps the opponent, causing them to lose 1/8 of their maximum HP after each turn, for 4-5 turns.
